name: Howay Man!
description:
Howay Man! is a rhythm-based, fanwork of the 2015 hit Christmas single "Pleasure Elf" (Hat Films, 2015).

Howay man follows a Hat Films (Yogscast) super fan who seeks to overthrow the reigning Pleasure Elf; a dark, cynical, and hyper-sexual singing Christmas elf, in order to earn their way into the good graces- and trophy case) of the Hat Films office in Yogtowers.  
The protagonist has hacked his way into the Hat Films computers- in a Tron-esque manner- sneaking through their personal files to find the Pleasure Elf character from the 2015 Jingle Jam, and replace the elf’s avatar with his own.

Controls:

Left Arrow Key

Right Arrow Key

Down Arrow Key
